trans-unit.source: Provides data for events that can be handled completely in an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per gli eventi che possono essere gestiti completamente in un gestore eventi.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set in an event handler to indicate that the system should perform no further processing.
trans-unit.target: In genere, il valore di <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A>proprietà è impostata in un gestore eventi per indicare che il sistema non deve eseguire alcuna ulteriore elaborazione.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class is a base class for types such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeightInfoPushedEventArgs>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs> classes.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe è una classe base per i tipi, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeightInfoPushedEventArgs>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs>classi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeightInfoPushedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs"></xref> class with a default <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs"> </xref> classe con un valore predefinito <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled*>valore della proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified default value for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs"> </xref> classe con il valore predefinito specificato per il <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled*>proprietà.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled*>

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled*> property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the event handler has completely handled the event or whether the system should continue its own processing.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il gestore dell'evento è gestito completamente l'evento o se il sistema deve rimanere la propria elaborazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been completely handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'evento è stato completamente gestito; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
